rule: Each part of speech tag in the response must exactly match one of the tags listed in the predefined list without any alterations in spelling, case, or punctuation.
output:
Part-of-speech tag for "beautiful" is NN (Proper noun, singular). As it's the same in both sentences, it remains the same.

The part-of-speech tag for "beautiful sunset" is JJ (Adjective), because "sunset" is an adjective modifying the noun "beautiful".
